author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify run21 version tracker flat minus05percent material files by taking care of multiple occurrence of materials in the definition of composite materials

#### PR validation:

Use the cfg's in Geometry/TrackerCommonData/test/python

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not sure if this needs to be back ported to 12_0_X
title: Run3-trk09A Modify run21 version tracker flat minus05percent material files by taking care of multiple occurrence of materials in the definition of composite materials
